Wolfpack pt 2

May 24, 2016

Puppy Finder

We’ve started our brainstorming today. Our goal is to build an app that helps pet owners who have recently lost a pet send out a notice for other people in the local area to be aware of and maybe help search. It’s the new modern alternative to hanging countless flyer’s around the neighborhood and hope someone takes the time to look at them.
